headline: GTA Online Update
subtitle: ‘Chuting Up
content: Take sky diving to the next level by purchasing a reserve Parachute from any Ammu-Nation, now also carrying a range of different parafoils, smokes and backpack styles.~n~~n~Cut your primary ‘chute by hitting ~INPUT_FRONTEND_Y~ and once free-falling hit ~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~ again to deploy your reserve ‘chute.
